Headline: No trains between Cottage Grove and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Cottage Grove and Garfield due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Cottage Grove and Garfield due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between Garfield and Harlem at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Cottage Grove and Garfield to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
